This is a sample text file for testing purposes.
It contains multiple sentences and paragraphs.

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
This sentence contains all letters of the alphabet.

Here's another paragraph with some numbers: 123, 456, 789.
And some punctuation marks: !@#$%^&*()

This file will be used to test:
- Text analysis functionality
- Word counting and statistics
- Readability scoring
- Text transformation operations

The end of the sample file.
